title: What comes into your mind when you hear the word modern? - Quora

response.answer_text: When I hear the word modern a couple of things enter my mind. Modern, new and fresh. Modern, something exciting, something with pazaz. Modern, futuristic, something that is beyond the time that is in. MODERN… btw interesting question.
I usually think of gleaming skyscrapers, computers, electricity, and poor behaviour.
